Key Match Events: Austin Wells hit a go-ahead three-run homer in the seventh inning
Hunter Renfroe led off the sixth with a homer to give the Royals a 4-3 lead
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Yankees surpassed last season’s win total and moved 1 1/2 games ahead of the Orioles
Others: Aaron Judge hit a tying single off James McArthur
Jasson Domínguez was promoted from Triple-A Scranton/Wilkes Barre
Salvador Perez homered, went 4 for 4 and drove in Kansas City its first three runs
Brady Singer allowed three runs and five hits in five innings
Jake Cousins picked off pinch hitter Kyle Isbel in the seventh
